FP7 CONCORDE - Development of Coordination Mechanisms during different kinds of Emergencies

goals__remit: PSCE is a permanent autonomous organisation, working to foster, by consensus building, excellence in the development and use of public safety communication and information management systems. PSCE provides a forum, where researchers, industry and users can meet to discuss and exchange ideas and best practices, develop roadmaps and improve the future of public safety communications.
